mining.name: Mining
mining.desc: Equip higher tech mining items. They increase the profitability of mining.

station.name: Station
station.desc: Build better, higher-tech, stations and equip station-specific items in them.

factory.name: Factory
factory.desc: Use higher-tech factories, which produce better things and are more efficient.

caravan.name: Caravan
caravan.desc: Have more non-combat ships in your fleet. Twice as effective as command.
